Sentencas: The use of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) systems in micro-CHP applications is of great interest because of high efficiency, low emissions and absence of noise.
Titulo: Dimethyl sulfide adsorption from natural gas for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: However, SOFCs are sensitive to degradation caused by organic sulfur compounds present in natural gas or added as odorants.
Titulo: Dimethyl sulfide adsorption from natural gas for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Among them, dimethyl sulfide (DMS) is one of the sulfur species most resistant to purification treatments and, relative to DMS removal, a lack in literature is highlighted for the investigated application.
Titulo: Dimethyl sulfide adsorption from natural gas for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Regarding adsorption technology, the present work deals with an organic sensitivity performance analysis of different commercial sorbents.
Titulo: Dimethyl sulfide adsorption from natural gas for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Virgin and impregnated activated carbons and a natural Zeolite were tested, varying gas hourly space velocity, reactor geometry and filter assembly.
Titulo: Dimethyl sulfide adsorption from natural gas for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Because of differences in activity towards DMS exhibited by the investigated materials, to exploit their selectivity, also layered sorbents were realized and tested.
Titulo: Dimethyl sulfide adsorption from natural gas for solid oxide fuel cell applications

Sentencas: Starting from resulting data, for the yearly operation of 1 kW(el) SOFC-based micro-CHP system, an optimization of filter assembly (also considering multi-layered configurations) and operative conditions was performed, leading to a strong reduction in filter volume (up to five times) and cost (more than three times), with overall pressure drops compatible with pipeline gas distribution pressure.
Titulo: Dimethyl sulfide adsorption from natural gas for solid oxide fuel cell applications
